Name: 仙界之剑 仙王少女战记
About the game: This game combines all kinds of elements such as the main plot, the regional plot, the rich tasks, the BOSS playing equipment, the collection of photo and music CDs, the search for treasure, the separation of spirits, the completion of the atlas, the mini game, etc., and can be played in multiple weeks. Each week will have new equipment, new props, powerful BUFF, new maps, new elements... It is not a fast-food game. The game time is at least hundreds of years, and it is suitable for quiet and slow experience, Welcome to friends who like those who like nostalgia for RPG.
